arts.ttl: Jude Bellingham speaks out on Real Madrid red card vs Osasuna
arts.sum: Real Madrid star Jude Bellingham has provided his response to the red card shown to him during the club’s meeting with Osasuna. The name of midfielder Bellingham has of course…

arts.ttl: Osasuna star makes all-time club history with goal vs Real Madrid
arts.sum: Osasuna star Ante Budimir on Saturday secured for himself a piece of club history. This comes owing to his exploits in the club’s latest outing. Osasuna welcomed table-topping Real Madrid…

arts.ttl: Jude Bellingham sends emphatic message to Osasuna referee after red card
arts.sum: In a calm manner, the Englishman sought to clarify what he said to official José Luis Munuera Montero during the game in Pamplona that led to his direct red card. By referring to the Spanish term, Bellingham was seemingly attempting to indicate his use of the phrase “fuck off” was down to his annoyance at the situation, not an insult aimed at the referee.

arts.ttl: European football: Real Madrid held by Osasuna after Bellingham sees red
arts.sum: Dortmund slump again in defeat to struggling Bochum Atalanta held at home by Cagliari in dull Serie A draw Real Madrid squandered the chance to cement their lead at the top of La Liga when they were held to a 1-1 draw at Osasuna on Saturday after playing most of the game with 10 men. Kylian Mbappé put Madrid ahead in the 50th minute, finishing from close range following a counter attack by Federico Valverde, before Jude Bellingham was handed his marching orders following an argument with the referee in the 39th minute. Continue reading...

arts.ttl: Osasuna 1-1 Real Madrid: Highlights, man of the match, stats as Jude Bellingham is given his marching orders in tense affair
arts.sum: Real Madrid have Jude Bellingham controversially sent off in a 1-1 draw with Osasuna in La Liga at El Sadar.

arts.ttl: Mbappé scores but Real Madrid draw at Osasuna
arts.sum: Real Madrid squandered the chance to cement their lead at the top of LaLiga with a 1-1 draw at Osasuna on Saturday after playing most of the game with 10 men.

arts.ttl: 10-man Real Madrid draws at Osasuna after Bellingham red card
arts.sum: Jude Bellingham was sent off and 10-man Real Madrid failed to hold its lead against Osasuna in a 1-1 draw in La Liga on Saturday. The draw in Pamplona puts Madrid’s league lead in jeopardy.
